de.uniwuerzburg.battletanks.entity

Class Player

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.uniwuerzburg.battletanks.entity.Entity
      • de.uniwuerzburg.battletanks.entity.Player
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.badlogic.gdx.utils.Disposable

    public class Player
extends Entity
    Represents a Player/Tank in the game logic

              int key_down,
              int key_left,
              int key_right,
              int key_shoot)
        Creates a new Player based on a given Tank model
        Parameters:
        tank - Tank model the Player is based on
        key_up - The players UP key
        key_down - The players DOWN key
        key_left - The players LEFT key
        key_right - The players RIGHT key
        key_shoot - The players SHOOT key
